진성 드래곤

DRAGON, TRUE

The known varieties of true 드래곤(as opposed to other creatures that have 드래곤 type) fall into two broad categories: chromatic and metallic. 오색 드래곤 are black, 파랑이, green, red, and white; they are all evil and extremely fierce. 금속 드래곤 are brass, bronze, copper, gold, and silver; they are all good, usually noble, and highly respected by the wise.

All true 드래곤 gain more 능력 and 상급 power as they 나이. (Other creatures that have 드래곤 type do not.) They 거리 in length from several feet upon hatching to more than 100 feet after attaining 상태확인 of great wyrm. The size of a particular 드래곤 varies according to 나이 and variety.

A 드래곤’s metabolism operates like a highly efficient furnace and can metabolize even inorganic material. Some 드래곤 have developed a taste for such fare.

Although goals and ideals vary among varieties, all 드래곤 are covetous. They like to hoard wealth, collecting mounds of 동전 and gathering as many gems, jewels, and 마법 아이템 as possible. Those with large hoards are loath to leave them for long, venturing out of their lairs only to patrol the immediate 범위 or to get food. For 드래곤, there is no such thing as enough 전리품. It’s pleasing to look at, and they bask in its radiance. 드래곤 like to make beds of their hoards, shaping nooks and mounds to fit their bodies. By the time a 드래곤 matures to 나이 of great wyrm, hundreds of gems and 동전 may be imbedded in its 숨기.

All 드래곤은 용언을 말할 수 있습니다.

전투

COMBAT

A 드래곤 공격 with its powerful claws and bite, and can also use a 브레스 무기 and special physical 공격, depending on its size. It prefers to fight on the wing, staying out of reach until it has worn down the enemy with ranged 공격. Older, more intelligent 드래곤 are 주문숙련자 at sizing up the opposition and eliminating the most dangerous foes first (or avoiding them while picking off weaker enemies).

The table below provides space and reach statistics for 드래곤 of various sizes, plus the natural 무기 a 드래곤 of a certain size can employ and 피해 those 공격 deal.

Bite: Bite 공격 deal the indicated 피해 plus 드래곤’s 근력 보너스. A 드래곤 also can use its bite to 잡아채기 opponents if it has 잡아채기 feat.

Claw: Claw 공격 deal the indicated 피해 plus 1/2 드래곤’s 근력 보너스(round down). 드래곤 also can use its claws to 잡아채기 opponents if it has 잡아채기 feat. Claw 공격 are secondary 공격, requiring a –5 페널티 on 명중 굴림. (Many 드래곤 choose 다중공격 feat to lessen this 페널티 to –2).

Wing: 드래곤 can slam opponents with its wings, even when flying. Wing 공격 deal the indicated 피해 plus 1/2 드래곤’s 근력 보너스(round down) and are treated as secondary 공격.

Tail Slap: 드래곤 can slap one opponent each round with its tail. A tail slap deals the indicated 피해 plus 1-1/2 times 드래곤’s 근력 보너스(round down) and is treated as a secondary 공격.

Crush (Ex): This special 공격 allows a flying or jumping 드래곤 of at least Huge size to land on opponents as a standard action, using its whole body to crush them. Crush 공격 are effective only against opponents three or more size categories smaller than 드래곤(though it can attempt normal 쇄도 or 드잡이 공격 against larger opponents).

A crush 공격 affects as many creatures as can fit under 드래곤’s body. Creatures in the affected 범위 must succeed on a Reflex save (DC equal to that of 드래곤’s 브레스 무기) or be pinned, automatically taking bludgeoning 피해 during the next round unless 드래곤 이동 off them. If 드래곤 chooses to maintain the pin, treat it as a normal 드잡이 공격. Pinned opponents take 피해 from the crush each round if they don’t escape.

A crush 공격 deals the indicated 피해 plus 1-1/2 times 드래곤’s 근력 보너스(round down).

Tail Sweep (Ex): This special 공격 allows a 드래곤 of at least Gargantuan size to sweep with its tail as a standard action. The sweep affects a half-circle with a radius of 30 feet (or 40 feet for a Colossal 드래곤), extending from an intersection on the edge of 드래곤’s space in any direction. Creatures within the swept 범위 are affected if they are four or more size categories smaller than 드래곤. A tail sweep automatically deals the indicated 피해 plus 1-1/2 times 드래곤’s 근력 보너스(round down). Affected creatures can attempt Reflex 내성 굴림 to take half 피해(DC equal to that of 드래곤’s 브레스 무기).

Grappling: 드래곤 do not favor 드잡이 공격, though their crush 공격(and 잡아채기 feat, if they know it) use normal 드잡이 rules. A 드래곤 can always use its 브레스 무기 while grappling, as well as its 주문 and spell-like or supernatural 능력, provided it succeeds on 집중 checks.

브레스 무기(Su): Using a 브레스 무기 is a standard action. Once a 드래곤 breathes, it can’t breathe again until 1d4 rounds later. If a 드래곤 has more than one type of 브레스 무기, it still can breathe only once every 1d4 rounds. A blast from a 브레스 무기 always starts at any intersection adjacent to 드래곤 and extends in a direction of 드래곤’s choice, with an 범위 as noted on the table below. If 브레스 무기 deals 피해, creatures caught in 범위 can attempt Reflex 내성 굴림 to take half 피해; the DC depends on the 드래곤’s 나이 and variety, and is given in each individual entry. 내성 굴림 against nondamaging 브레스 무기 use the same DC; the kind of 내성 굴림 is noted in the variety 묘사. The save DC against a 브레스 무기 is 10 + 1/2 드래곤’s HD + 드래곤’s Con 수정치.

브레스 무기 come in two basic shapes, line and cone, whose 범위 vary with 드래곤’s size.

끔찍한 존재(Ex): A young adult or older 드래곤 can unsettle foes with its mere presence. The ability takes effect automatically whenever 드래곤 공격, 돌격, or flies overhead. Creatures within a radius of 30 feet x 드래곤’s 나이 category are subject to the effect if they have fewer HD than 드래곤. A potentially affected creature that succeeds on a Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 드래곤’s HD + 드래곤’s Cha 수정치) remains immune to that 드래곤’s 끔찍한 존재 for 24 hours. On a failure, creatures with 4 or less HD become panicked for 4d6 rounds and those with 5 or more HD become shaken for 4d6 rounds. 드래곤 ignore 끔찍한 존재 of other 드래곤.

주문: A 드래곤 knows and casts 비전 주문 as a 소서러 of 레벨 indicated in its variety 묘사, gaining 보너스 주문 for a high 매력 score. Some 드래곤 can also cast 주문 from 사제 list or 사제 domain lists as 비전 주문.

Spell-Like 능력: A 드래곤’s spell-like 능력 depend on its 나이 and variety. It gains 능력 indicated for its 나이 plus all previous ones. Its 나이 category or its 소서러 시전자 레벨, whichever is higher, is 시전자 레벨 for these 능력. The save DC is 10 + 드래곤’s Cha 수정치 + spell 레벨. All spell-like 능력 are usable once per day unless otherwise noted.

피해 축소: Young adult and older 드래곤 have 피해 축소. Their natural 무기 are treated as 마법 무기 for 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Immunities (Ex): All 드래곤 have immunity to 수면 and 마비 effects. Each variety of 드래곤 has immunity to one or two additional forms of 공격 no matter what its 나이, as given in its 묘사.

주문 저항(Ex): As 드래곤 나이, they become more resistant to 주문 and spell-like 능력, as indicated in the variety 묘사.

Blindsense (Ex): 드래곤 can pinpoint creatures within a distance of 60 feet. Opponents 드래곤 can’t actually see still have total 은폐 against 드래곤.

Keen Senses (Ex): A 드래곤 sees four times as well a human in shadowy illumination and twice as well in normal 빛. It also has 암흑시야 out to 120 feet.

스킬: All 드래곤 have skill points equal to (6 + Int 수정치, minimum 1) x (히트 다이스 + 3). Most 드래곤 purchase the following 스킬 at the maximum ranks possible: 듣기, 탐색, and 감지. The remaining skill points are generally spent on 집중, 외교, 탈출 전문가, 위협, 지식(any), 의도 파악, and 마법 장치 사용 at a cost of 1 skill point per rank. All these 스킬 are considered 직업 스킬 for 드래곤. (Each 드래곤 has other 직업 스킬 as well, as noted in the variety 묘사.)

특기: All 드래곤 have one feat, plus additional 특기 based on 히트 다이스 just like any other creature. 드래곤 favor 경계, 장님 전투, 쪼개기, 공중 공격, 호버링, 향상된 선제권, 향상된 무기 파괴, 강한 공격, 잡아채기, 무기 집중(claw or bite), 급회전 기동, and any 메타마법 feat that is available and useful to 소서러.

검은 드래곤 are sometimes known as skull 드래곤 because of their skeletal faces. Adding to the skeletal impression is the gradual deterioration of 숨기 around the base of the horn and the cheekbones. This deterioration increases with 나이 and does not 해악 드래곤. On hatching, a 검은 드래곤’s scales are thin, small, and glossy. As 드래곤 나이, they become larger, thicker, and duller, helping it camouflage itself in swamps and marshes.

검은 드래곤 are especially fond of 동전. Older 드래곤 sometimes capture and question humanoids about stockpiles of gold, silver, and platinum 동전 before killing them.

전투

Combat

검은 드래곤 prefer to ambush their targets, using their surroundings as 엄폐. When fighting in heavily forested swamps and marshes, they try to stay in the water or on the ground; trees and leafy canopies limit their aerial maneuverability. When outmatched, a 검은 드래곤 attempts to 비행 out of sight, so as not to leave 추적, and 숨기 in a deep pond or bog.

브레스 무기(Su): A 검은 드래곤 has one type of 브레스 무기, a line of acid.

수중 호흡(Ex): A 검은 드래곤 can breathe underwater indefinitely and can freely use its 브레스 무기, 주문, and other 능력 while submerged.

Corrupt Water (Sp): Once per day an adult or older 검은 드래곤 can stagnate 10 cubic feet of water, making it become still, foul, and unable to support animal life. The ability spoils liquids containing water. 마법 아이템(such as potions) and items in a creature’s possession must succeed on a Will save (DC equal to that of the 드래곤’s 끔찍한 존재) or become fouled. This ability is the equivalent of a 1st-레벨 spell. Its 거리 is equal to that of 드래곤’s 끔찍한 존재.

Charm Reptiles (Sp): A great wyrm 검은 드래곤 can use this ability three times per day. It works as a 광역 charm spell that affects only reptilian animals. 드래곤 can communicate with any charmed reptiles as though casting a 동물과 대화 spell. This ability is the equivalent of a 1st-레벨 spell.

Other Spell-Like 능력: 3/day—암흑 (juvenile or older; radius 10 feet per 나이 category), 곤충 역병 (ancient or older); 1/day—식물 성장 (old or older).

스킬: 숨기, 조용히 이동, and 수영 are considered 직업 스킬 for 검은 드래곤.
